trans-unit.source: Represents the geometry of a circle or ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 代表圓形或橢圓形的幾何。

trans-unit.source: Use the EllipseGeometry class with a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path> element or a <xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> to draw an ellipse, or with the <xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> property of a <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> to define an elliptical clip region.
trans-unit.target: 使用與 EllipseGeometry 類別<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path>項目或<xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing>繪製橢圓形，或使用<xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>定義橢圓形的裁剪區域。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.UIElement.Clip%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.GeometryDrawing> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Path>

trans-unit.source: The EllipseGeometry class also has many other uses.
trans-unit.target: EllipseGeometry 類別也有許多其他用途。

trans-unit.source: For more information about EllipseGeometry, see [Geometry Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需 EllipseGeometry 的詳細資訊，請參閱[幾何概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。

trans-unit.source: EllipseGeometry Compared to Ellipse The <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> class has a <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A>, and other rendering properties that EllipseGeometry lacks.
trans-unit.target: EllipseGeometry 相較於橢圓形<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>類別具有<xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A>， <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A>，和 EllipseGeometry 缺少其他轉譯屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Stroke%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Shape.Fill%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse> class is a <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> and therefore participates in the layout system; it can be used as the content of any element that supports <xref:System.Windows.UIElement> children.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>類別是<xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>並參與版面配置系統，因此可以做的任何支援的項目內容<xref:System.Windows.UIElement>子系。</xref:System.Windows.UIElement> </xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> </xref:System.Windows.Shapes.Ellipse>

trans-unit.source: The EllipseGeometry class, on the other hand, simply defines the geometry of an ellipse, and cannot render itself.
trans-unit.target: EllipseGeometry 類別，相反地，只要定義橢圓形的幾何，並無法呈現其本身。

trans-unit.source: Because of its simplicity, it has a wider range of uses.
trans-unit.target: 其簡化，因為它有廣泛的使用。

trans-unit.source: Freezable Features An EllipseGeometry is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: 可凍結功能 EllipseGeometry 是一種<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件，並因此可凍結來改善效能。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關資訊<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>功能，例如凍結和複製，請參閱[Freezable 物件概觀](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> class that has a horizontal diameter equal to the width of the passed <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>, a vertical diameter equal to the length of the passed <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>, and a center point location equal to the center of the passed <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>類別的水平的直徑等於寬度的傳入<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>，垂直的直徑等於傳入長度<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>，以及的中心點的傳入等於中央的位置<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The rectangle that describes the ellipse dimensions.
trans-unit.target: 描述橢圓形維度矩形。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> class as an ellipse that has a specified center location, x radius, and y radius.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>類別做為具有指定的中心位置，半徑與 y 軸半徑 x 的橢圓形。

trans-unit.source: The location of the center of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形的中心位置。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal radius of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形的水平半徑。

trans-unit.source: The vertical radius of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形的垂直半徑。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> class that has the specified position, size, and transformation.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>類別具有指定的位置、 大小和轉換。

trans-unit.source: The location of the center of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形的中心位置。

trans-unit.source: The horizontal radius of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形的水平半徑。

trans-unit.source: The vertical radius of the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 橢圓形的垂直半徑。

trans-unit.source: The transformation to apply to the ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 要套用至橢圓形，來轉換。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <xref href="System.Windows.Rect"></xref> that represents the bounding box of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得<xref href="System.Windows.Rect"> </xref> ，代表這個週框方塊<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method does not consider the extra area potentially added by a stroke.
trans-unit.target: 這個方法不會考慮額外可能加筆觸的區域。

trans-unit.source: The bounding box of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 週框方塊的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the center point of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的中心點<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The center point of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 中心點<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.Center*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.Center*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.Center*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>，製作這個物件值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （但可能已不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立可修改複製品這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>物件，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、 資料繫結和動畫，但是其目前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 複製的物件<> *> 屬性會是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使來源的<> *> 屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets the area of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得這個區域<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Some <xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry> methods (such as GetArea) produce or use a polygonal approximation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 某些<xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>方法 （例如 GetArea) 產生，或使用幾何的多邊形近似值。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Geometry>

trans-unit.source: The tolerance factor specifies the maximum distance between points in this polygonal approximation.
trans-unit.target: 容錯因數指定點中此多邊形近似值之間的最大距離。

trans-unit.source: Smaller tolerance values produce better approximations, but they require more processing than an approximation with a large tolerance factor.
trans-unit.target: 較小的容錯值不會產生更好的近似值，但需要更多的處理比使用大型容錯因數的近似值。

trans-unit.source: The maximum bounds on the distance between points in the polygonal approximation of the geometry.
trans-unit.target: 距離點之幾何的多邊形近似值之間最大上限。

trans-unit.source: Smaller values produce more accurate results but cause slower execution.
trans-unit.target: 較小的值會產生更精確的結果，但會導致執行速度緩慢。

trans-unit.source: If `tolerance` is less than .000001, .000001 is used instead.
trans-unit.target: 如果`tolerance`是小於.000001.000001 改為使用。

trans-unit.source: One of the enumeration values, <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType"></xref> or <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType"></xref>, that specifies whether the tolerance factor is an absolute value or relative to the area of this geometry.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個列舉值， <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType"> </xref>或<xref href="System.Windows.Media.ToleranceType"> </xref>，指定是否容錯因數為絕對值，或相對於這種幾何形狀的區域。

trans-unit.source: The area of the filled region of this ellipse.
trans-unit.target: 此橢圓形的填滿區域的區域。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> object is empty.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>物件是空的。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> is empty; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>是空的否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> object can have curved segments.
trans-unit.target: 決定是否此<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>物件可以具有弧形線段。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref> object can have curved segments; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果這個<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>物件可以具有弧形區段，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the x-radius value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的 x 半徑值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The x-radius value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: X 半徑值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusX*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusX*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusX*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the y-radius value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定的 y 半徑值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The y-radius value of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Y 半徑值<xref href="System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusY*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 識別<xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusY*>相依性屬性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.EllipseGeometry.RadiusY*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。
